original: 劉備郊祀天地，以諸葛亮為丞相，許靖為司徒。又置百官，立宗廟，建號章武，承漢國號。
text: Liu Bei offered sacrifices to the world, with Zhuge Liang as prime minister and Xu Jing as Situ. Hundred officials were set up, the ancestral temple was established, and the title of Zhangwu was built, and the title of Han Dynasty was adopted.
